title: Can a moderator here tell me when I'm unbanned from the boards?
body:
tl;dr I said one mean thing to someone and got banned. It said 1 day in the post removal, but when I log into the account it says this

My ban ends at...? When exactly? Is it even one day? Can we have this fixed please? This has happened to me one other time, and it said I was banned until like 1967 or something like that, when it was actually one week.

The account's name is Haunt.

EDIT: Yea fuck me for asking why I was banned on the Moderation boards instead of the General Discussion board like I already did. (It got removed because it belongs on this board)

Glad to see this worked out. All I got was downvotes and no response. Why delete my thread and not even help me?

Wow someone useful, thank you!

Basically I said something rude, got banned, and I looked at my previous accusations from post removals. None of them are for harassment except one where I called my friend a fu**boi since he was annoying me at work. Other than that, i have not received any harassment notices in MONTHS.

After seeing that I just logged into this account.

> 
> After seeing that I just logged into this account.

Looking into this further the messaging could have detailed a bit more about the other offenses which resulted in the one day given and not just "Don't be a Jerk" removals. The messaging given was:

> Due to the continuous insulting and harassments made from your account, a 1 day suspension has been issued.

There were other violations within the month of October which included the one you mentioned and a moderator discretion which fell under the description of insulting and harassing.

As for the ban duration bug, can you provide me some information which I can send over to Boards Development which will help them greatly in fixing this?

* Banned userâ€™s name
* Link to page where they saw it (even if it happens on every page)
* Right click on an offending page and choose Inspect Element, then go to the console page, refresh the page, send a screen shot that includes the console area

It said one day in the post removal. How long has it been? Keep in mind that Riot's bans are typically down to the minute, so if you were banned at 5:04pm yesterday, you wouldn't have access until 5:04pm today.

Agreed that it sucks that the notice seems bugged out and doesn't show you the actual duration of the ban. But you also seem a bit impatient. Give it some time and hopefully you'll either get a response here, or be unbanned once your 1-day is up and can go troll the depths of GD again (god only knows why you'd subject yourself to that, but to each their own).

I'm assuming it'll be 24 hours, but I am just wondering why I can't see it.

Sorry, I wasn't trying to say trolling in that sense. I meant it more in the sense of hanging around GD.

The time isn't showing because of a bug on the site. I'm sure it's on their backlog to fix, and hopefully will be done soon, cause not having that timer on there really does suck.

I'm not sure if this is a bug or if they've actually implemented a change that makes banned users unable to view threads and see how long they're banned. They're aware of this and they have yet to fix it so I assume that it's intended (which is pretty fucking retarded).
